titleInfo.title: From "identity" to "belonging" in social research. Plurality, social boundaries, and the politics of the self
ESJ European Scientific Journal. Special edition: Contemporary Sri Lankan Society and Politics: Felicitation volume in honour of renowned Sri Lankan Sociologist Professor ST Hettige

bibliographicCitation.angewandte-chemie: J. Pfaff-Czarnecka, “From "identity" to "belonging" in social research. Special edition: Contemporary Sri Lankan Society and Politics: Felicitation volume in honour of renowned Sri Lankan Sociologist Professor ST Hettige, 2020, 16, 113-132.
